applicant-name.name: 苏州福睿能源有限责任公司

invention-title: Hydrogen production reaction device taking waste aluminum as raw material
一种以废铝为原料的制氢反应装置

abstract.p: The invention relates to the technical field of new energy, in particular to a hydrogen production reaction device with waste aluminum as a raw material. Comprising a nano aluminum fuel core, a reaction shell assembly, an exhaust one-way valve, a safety valve, a pressure sensor, a temperature sensor, a discharge control valve, a water inlet control valve, a water return control valve, a blow-down valve, a water tank, a preheater, a high-pressure water pump, a heat regenerator, a heat exchanger, a separator and a controller. The nano-aluminum fuel core is processed by using waste aluminum as a raw material, a high-temperature and high-pressure reaction environment is created by violent reaction of nano-aluminum and water, aluminum atoms and water continuously generate hydrogen production reaction and heat release, nano-aluminum is continuously converted into aluminum hydroxide, and the aluminum hydroxide loses crystal water under the condition of being heated, generates dehydration reaction and is decomposed, so that the aluminum hydroxide is subjected to hydrogen production and heat release. And finally converting into aluminum oxide. The heat of the hydrogen production reaction is recycled for heat supply, industrial production process or conversion into electric energy, and green hydrogen can be directly applied to natural gas power plants and hydrogen refueling stations.

本发明涉及新能源技术领域，具体涉及一种以废铝为原料的制氢反应装置，包括纳米铝燃料芯、反应壳体组件、排气单向阀、安全阀、压力传感器、温度传感器、泄放控制阀、进水控制阀、回水控制阀、排污阀、水箱、预热器、高压水泵、回热器、热交换器、分离器及控制器。所述的纳米铝燃料芯以废铝作为原材料加工而成，纳米铝与水的剧烈反应营造高温和高压的反应环境，铝原子和水持续发生制氢反应和放热，纳米铝持续转变为氢氧化铝，氢氧化铝在受热的情况下会失去结晶水，发生脱水反应并分解，最终转化为氧化铝。制氢反应的热量被回收用于供暖、工业生产过程或转换为电能，绿色氢气可直接应用于天然气发电厂和加氢站。
